    • hasAppointments

      public static boolean hasAppointments(Customer customer) throws SQLException
      This method is used to see if a customer in the database has any currently schedule appointments by comparing their Customer_ID against the Customer_ID of every Appointment in the database
      Parameters:
      customer - the Customer whose appointments are being searched for
      Returns:
      returns true if the customer has appointments and false if they have no appointments
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getDivisionName

      public static String getDivisionName(int divisionId) throws SQLException
      This method uses a PreparedStatement to make an SQL statement that returns the Name of a Division based on its Division_ID in the database
      Parameters:
      divisionId - the Division_ID of a given first level division (state/province)
      Returns:
      returns the Name of a Division from the database
      Throws:
      SQLException
